long_description: The Smith Prospect Polarized sunglasses protect your eyes from harmful exposure and keep up with your active lifestyle with lightweight frames and a solid grip that stays put even if they get wet. Polarized carbonic polycarbonate lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. 8-base-curve lenses; (the higher the number the more curved the lens-Smith features sunglasses with 6, 7, 8 and 9 base curvature). Hydrophilic Megol(TM) nosepiece and temple ends on the Smith Prospect Polarized sunglasses become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. Frames are made from bio-plastic Rislan(R) Clear (derived from non-GMO castor seeds) for a resilient, durable and consistent fit.
short_description: The Smith Prospect Polarized sunglasses protect your eyes from harmful exposure and keep up with your active lifestyle with lightweight frames and a solid grip that stays put even if they get wet.
